head.title: Rounding Up a Pair of Mules

hedline.hl1: Rounding Up a Pair of Mules

abstract.p: Letter by Josef Blumenfeld responds to June 1 article on buying shoes on Internet; says he found article very humorous

block.p: I laughed out loud while reading about Michelle Slatalla's quest for Tommy Hilfiger mules (Online Shopper, ''On a Shoe Quest From Clicks to Mortar,'' June 1). My wife went through similar online contortions for a pair of Fendi loafers from Bloomingdale's just last week. I agree that it is more comfortable to order online from a seller with a real store nearby. I ordered a Prada bag for my wife's birthday from -- of all places -- Costco.com. I took great comfort in knowing that if she doesn't like it, I can take it back to the Costco that is just a short drive away.
